Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf

This package contains various performance enhancements used in the Idemix crypto lib.

          Description

Interface Summary
ModPow Abstraction for the modular exponentiation operation.
 

Class Summary
DefModPow Default BigInteger exponentiation.
Exponentiation To describe a modular exponentiation: base, exponent, and modulus.
FixedBaseComb Fixed-base comb method, section 14.6.3 in the green crypto book (Menezes et al.).
FixedBaseWindowing Implementation of fixed-base windowing method for exponentiation.
ModPowCache  
MultiCoreMultiBase To compute the product of modular exponentiations on a multi-core setting.
SafePrimes  
 

Package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf Description

This package contains various performance enhancements used in the Idemix crypto lib.

One supported feature is the fixed-base exponentiation support. There are two methods implemented: fixed-base window and fixed-base comb method.

Another module implements multi-core exponentiation to make use of multi-core processors. And yet another class generates safe-primes using a multi-core processor.
